title: $:/litClock/times/-02:20-Antoine de Saint Exupery
quote_first: She turned abruptly to the nurse and asked the time. ‘
quote_last: ’ ‘Ah…Two-twenty!’ Genevieve repeated, as though there was something urgent to be done.

title: $:/litClock/times/-02:20-Jack Finney
quote_first: The night of his third walk Lew slept in his own apartment. When his eyes opened at
quote_last: , by the green hands of his alarm, he knew that this time he’d actually been waiting for it in his sleep.
